content:encoded:
Topics: Sexual Addiction, PTSD, Triggers, Betrayal, Engagement, Dating, Boundaries, Siblings, Schizophrenia
Hosts: Chris Williams, Dr. Alice Benton, Amanda Anderson

Caller Questions:

  1. I came into my marriage with sexual addiction and caused my wife to have PTSD with my disclosure. How do we navigate her triggers? 
  2. Restore was lifechanging for me! 
  3. I’m in my 60’s and engaged. I’m choosing to love but don’t have feelings of love. Is this a red flag? 
  4. How do I set boundaries with family? Also, how do I get help for my brother who has schizophrenia? 

Suggested Resources:
Worthy of Her Trust
How We Love
One Year Bible for Women
Emotional Freedom Workbook
Take Your Life Back

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
